description:
You’ve got to respect your contact points. Whether your next ride is long or short, you’ll appreciate the shock absorbing comfort of Giro’s Monaco II gloves. Articulated construction, precise padding, and easy to wash materials make these gloves a worth addition to your summer kit.

  • Technogel® medical grade padding conforms to your hands and helps absorb vibration
  • Stretchy synthetic on the back of the and wicks away moisture and dries quickly
  • Pittards® sheep leather is thin, durable, perforated for breathability, and specially treated to resist sweat
  • Microfibre on the thumb for wiping away sweat and sniffles
  • Fingertip pockets for easy removal
  • Paneled construction hugs the contours of your hands
  • Strategic double-stitching for enhanced durability
  • Hook and loop closure at the cuffs, keeps your gloves right where you want them
name: Giro Monaco II Gel Gloves - Unisex
